title: Your first penta?
body:
I just got my first penta as renekton, I was 9-0 at about 20 min and we had a team fight by their base thet got to tower withh 5 alive but i dove to kill their adc and support and got the double with just under half health then there mid,top,jungle tried to 1v3 me and I managed to kill there top laners then chase there jungler before he got to the nexus turrets, there mid was camping under the towers trying to pick me off with a spear(I had about 150 health) when there minions spawned I dashed twice to get my q off for the penta.

Now I'm wondering what was your guys first penta like and who was it with?
